name: yeetfile
tagline: A simple and private file sharing service
description: YeetFile is a self-hosted file sharing app for sending files quickly with expiring links and optional passwords. It focuses on simplicity and privacy while providing a straightforward browser interface.

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Secure file downloads with optional passwords to control who can access shared content

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Drag and drop files into the browser or use the upload button for straightforward file

features.title: No Registration Required
features.description: Share files without forcing recipients to create accounts or sign in to download

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Host files on your own infrastructure without relying on third-party services that track users

features.title: Download Limits
features.description: Restrict the number of times a file can be downloaded before the link becomes invalid

features.title: File Size Limits
features.description: Configure maximum upload sizes to manage storage capacity and prevent abuse
